former Republican presidential candidate hit back yesterday over unflattering comments made by Mr Donald Rumsfeld in his new autobiography, Known and Unknown. Reviving a feud between the pair, Mr Donald Rumsfeld describes John McCain in his book as a man with a hair-trigger temper and a propensity to fashion and shift his positions to appeal to the media. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race. ''I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
